5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Qais bin ‘Aidh, who was Abu Kahil, said:“I saw the Prophet (ﷺ) delivering the sermon atop a beautiful she-camel, and an Ethiopian was holding onto its reins.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْخُطْبَةِ فِي الْعِيدَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the sermon for ‘Eid
